children.Description:
Validator for ensuring strong passwords in Symfony2 applications

children.Name: PasswordStrengthBundle

children.Description: Provides a FilterService for Symfony to allow users to implement input filtering in entities using Annotations
children.Name: dms-filter-bundle

children.Description:
Symfony bundle for the VATIN library
A Symfony2 bundle for the VATIN library (validate VAT identification numbers).

children.Description:
JSON API Transformer Bundle for Symfony 2 and Symfony 3
Bundle which provides support for formatting REST reponses to follow the JSON API specification.

children.Description: Add rate limits to your controllers / actions easily through annotations

children.Description: A symfony bundle to handle multiple upload ways on your REST API.
children.Name: SRIORestUploadBundle

children.Description:
Adds CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) headers support in your Symfony application
Adds ability to add CORS-related headers based on simple ACL-style per-URL configurations.

children.Description:
A bundle to generate json schema based on various metadata
Provide a service which allow you to generate json schema based on validation metadata.
children.Name: KnpJsonSchemaBundle

children.Description: A simple bundle to provide an easy way to send out json/xml/yaml responses of serialized objects with annotations.
children.Name: SerializedResponseBundle

children.Description:
Symfony 2 bundle allows you to fast generate REST api for your entities
Provide fast and simple way to generate REST api for your project entities without editing configs and creating any controllers.
children.Name: JMDRestBundle

children.Description:
JWT authentication for your Symfony REST API
This bundle provides JWT (Json Web Token) authentication for your REST API using the namshi/jose library.

children.Description: With this bundle you can easy limit requests to your application.

children.Description:

children.Description:

children.Description: Symfony bundle that helps in developing REST APIs.

children.Description:
